of-addon.name: ofxTimeline
of-addon.description:
A lightweight timeline addon for openframeworks.
Dependent on the following addons
ofxXmlSettings (core library) ofxTween ( https://github.com/arturoc/ofxTween ) ofxRange ( https://github.com/Flightphase/ofxRange ) ofxTextInputField ( https://github.com/Flightphase/ofxTextInputField )
